result.markdown:
---
title: "The 'Odd' Obsession with Odds Ratios: Making a Case for Marginal Effects in Health Research"
description: "Marginal Effects >>> Odds Ratios"
author: "Jacob Jameson"
date: "2023-09-01"
categories: [marginal effects]
output:
  tufte::tufte_html: default
  tufte::tufte_handout:
    citation_package: natbib
    latex_engine: xelatex
  tufte::tufte_book:
    citation_package: natbib
    latex_engine: xelatex
link-citations: true
reference-location: margin
comments:
  utterances:
    repo: jacobjameson/jacobjameson.github.io
format:
  html:
    theme: slate
---



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(0)
n <- 1000  # Number of observations
X <- matrix(rnorm(n * 2), ncol = 2)  # Two covariates
beta <- c(0.5, -0.25)  # True effect sizes
intercept <- 0.2  # True intercept
noise <- rnorm(n) * 0.5  # Noise

# Linear outcome
linear_y <- intercept + X %*% beta + noise

# Binary outcome
binary_y <- as.integer(linear_y > 0)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ols_fit <- lm(linear_y ~ X)
summary(ols_fit)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = linear_y ~ X)

Residuals:
     Min       1Q   Median       3Q      Max 
-1.57460 -0.32400  0.00088  0.31575  1.48493 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept)  0.23440    0.01511   15.52   <2e-16 ***
X1           0.50587    0.01514   33.41   <2e-16 ***
X2          -0.24042    0.01462  -16.45   <2e-16 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 0.4775 on 997 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.5843,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.5834 
F-statistic: 700.6 on 2 and 997 DF,  p-value: < 2.2e-16
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
logit_fit <- glm(binary_y ~ X, family = binomial)
summary(logit_fit)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
glm(formula = binary_y ~ X, family = binomial)

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error z value Pr(>|z|)    
(Intercept)  0.97739    0.09451  10.341   <2e-16 ***
X1           1.83890    0.12592  14.603   <2e-16 ***
X2          -0.86529    0.09277  -9.328   <2e-16 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

(Dispersion parameter for binomial family taken to be 1)

    Null deviance: 1310.25  on 999  degrees of freedom
Residual deviance:  859.56  on 997  degrees of freedom
AIC: 865.56

Number of Fisher Scoring iterations: 5
```
:::
:::
